blog.name: mint-mayhem
blog.title: Romero Time baby
blog.description: ● Kat/Mint ● They/She ● 18 ● Art Blog ●

summary: If I may ask, what are your headcanons for Juzo/Shihai?
question: If I may ask, what are your headcanons for Juzo/Shihai?
answer:
!!!!

-Shihai immediately takes to calling Juzo my love/love/beloved

-Juzo cannot call Shihai any pet names or Shihai will no longer be able to function because he is a dumb dramatic gay

-Juzo is naturally affectionate so he and Shihai cuddle a lot

-both of them have insomnia/a poor sleep schedule so they have late night dates

-Shihai is a bit overprotective and frets over small things when it comes to Juzo. After training, he asks if he’s okay, and if he got hurt and other such things that, Juzo, as an in training hero, is more than used to.

-Juzo has a bad tendency of getting jealous when other people are overly friendly to Shihai (mainly because of his own insecurities)

-Shihai’s favorite activity is peppering his boyfriends face with lots of smooches

-Halloween is datenight

-Shihai hates Juzos hero name but Can Not Tell Him

reblog.comment:

title: BnHA AU fanfic rec
body:
The Curse of the anime protagonist by masterdipster
Rated T; 129,418 words; ongoing; canon divergence; no ships yet

Dance around in your smoke by thehibiscusthief 
Rated T; 8,012 words; completed; dance AU; TodoDeku

Can Your Heart Rate Rise a Little? by inanimaterambles
Rated T; 7,017 words; completed; College AU; TodoDeku

Rated G; 219,273 words; completed; Deaf!Izuku AU; QP TodoDeku

Rated T; 104,103 words; ongoing; Quirkless!Shouto AU;  TodoDeku

Rated T; 124,148 words, ongoing; celebrity AU; BakuShima      10/10

Ask box is always open and don't be afraid to ask for something to be tagged.) header commissioned from @feorie

blog.name: thebokunobirthdayproject
blog.description: And then I said "how bad could it be"

tags: I will learn skirts one day but today is not that day
also I drew the shoes from memory! I didn’t need a reference for this one!
getting better at shoes wasn’t an intended or expected result from this project but a welcome one nonetheless
caption: happy birthday tsuyu!

tags: let this ship be canon pls
summary:
2/2 of the rare pairs i ship (and ships for you to consider too hoho)
i started shipping them when i rewatched bnha and there...
body:
2/2 of the rare pairs i ship (and ships for you to consider too hoho)

TETSUBARA/TETSUZAKI

i started shipping them when i rewatched bnha and there was this scene where tetsu was carrying vine bby shiozaki and he said he was mad because the gas hurt her (the class 1-b in general but yeah) so i was,,, omg they’re a good ship??? and then i remembered they were teammates for the cavalry battle too like yOU KNOW WHAT SURE I’LL ADD YOU TO MY RARE PAIR HELL SO NOW HERE I AM, AN ACTUAL TRASH FOR THEM. headcanon their relationship to be pretty chaotic. like,,, tetsu knows he has a crush on shiozaki but isn’t accepting it because it’s not mAnLy and all but at the same time is feeling wimpy and unmanly bc he can’t tell het and then shiozaki is oblivious that she has a crush on tetsu. shiozaki probably found tetsu’s chivalrous attitude his most attractive asset HAHAHA.

PRESENTNIGHT/MICNIGHT

i dont rly remember where i saw it but it was a drawing (idk if it was official or not either) of hizashi and nemuri tgt reading something and they were this eyeglass otp my heart jumped up do high i was wildt af so yeah ship micnight for better life.

DABIYAMA/YUDABI

i dont know fam idrk im cryign i really ship them. my headcanon for them is that they’re the very ! nsfw ¡ couple. dabi calls yu his babygirl or something

HAWKS X FUYUMI

yall probably hate me by now but yeah i love them sm endeavor pls approve of hawks for fuyumi i want icy chicken wings lmao jk. anyways i headcanon them as the pure pair. hawks sending wholesome memes to fuyumi late at night knowing fuyumi is still awake making visual aids and fuyumi just,,, melts. fuyumi’s students knoes hawks because he often visits fuyumi at work.

HITOHATSU

basically eraserjoke 2.0 JDKSJFJS
